cases.description: Low risk - young male, optimal parameters, low-risk region
cases.source: SCORE2-Diabetes: 45yo male, low region, non-smoker, SBP 120, TC 180, HDL 55, HbA1c 6.0, eGFR 90. Formula: tchol_mmol=180/38.67, hdl_mmol=55/38.67, hba1c_mmol=6.0*10.93-23.5. Risk=2.8%

cases.description: Moderate risk - middle-aged female, moderate region
cases.source: SCORE2-Diabetes: 55yo female, moderate region, non-smoker, SBP 140, TC 220, HDL 45, HbA1c 7.5, eGFR 70. Risk=16.2%

cases.description: High risk - older male, smoker, high region
cases.source: SCORE2-Diabetes: 65yo male, high region, smoker, SBP 160, TC 250, HDL 35, HbA1c 9.0, eGFR 50. Risk=97.0%

cases.description: Very high risk - very high region, multiple risk factors
cases.source: SCORE2-Diabetes: 68yo male, very_high region, smoker, SBP 170, TC 280, HDL 30, HbA1c 10.0, eGFR 40. Risk=100.0%

cases.description: Low risk female - low region, optimal values
cases.source: SCORE2-Diabetes: 42yo female, low region, non-smoker, SBP 110, TC 170, HDL 65, HbA1c 5.8, eGFR 100. Risk=0.8%
